name: Tinkies
description:
An ancient and powerful race has returned and is seeking revenge.

Take control of a Tinkie, with unique abilities in the quest to eliminate hunters and retrieve the sacred eggs.

In this cooperative game, you'll need to work with a friend (or foe) to overcome obstacles, take down hunters and take over the world.

Be the chicken and protect your partner, or kill hunters with the snake. The only thing that matters is: the Tinkies are rising.

AMAZING art:

https://v3x3d.itch.io/retro-lines

Controls:

AD / Left and Right Arrows - Movement

W/Up Arrow - Jump

Esc - Pause

R - Restart

Joystick:

Analogic - Movement

X/A - Jump

Made by:

andreweber

mikomoares
